abort.no_devices_found: No devices found on the network
abort.single_instance_allowed: Already configured. Only a single configuration possible.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to F&F Fox device. Check RestAPI key and WiFi connection.

confirm.description: Do you want to start set up?

user.description: Start configuration or add device manually.

data.rest_api_key: Default RestAPI key for all devices
data.assign_area: Assign all devices to one area

discovering_summary.description:
We found {devices_amount} F&F Fox devices. 
 Go forward to configure them. Have RESTApi access keys ready - You can find it in Fox mobile application.

configure_device.description:
You are configuring F&F Fox device: {device_type}, identified by following id: {device_id} and IP address: {device_host}. 
 Fill the name of the device or leave empty to get it from F&F Fox device. 
 If you configured F&F Fox device with no auth key, 000 key will be used as default.

manual.description: No devices found. Add device manually.

progress.task: We are discovering F&F Fox devices in your local network.

error.invalid_zero: Value must be grather than zero!

data.polling: Set pooling interval in seconds. (How often HA should refresh device state).

set_cover_and_tilt_positions.name: Set cover and tilt positions
set_cover_and_tilt_positions.description: Set cover and tilt positions in one call.

set_cover_position_with_blocking.name: Set cover position with blocking time
set_cover_position_with_blocking.description: Set cover position with blocking time.
